item.title: The miscalibration of the honeybee odometer
item.description: arXiv:2405.12998v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We examine a series of articles on honeybee odometry and navigation published between 1996 and 2010, and find inconsistencies in results, duplicated figures, indications of data manipulation, and incorrect calculations. This suggests that redoing the experiments in question is warranted.
item.dc:creator: Laura Luebbert, Lior Pachter
